CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Diagnosis Confirmed stage positioned above or below the Initial Consultation stage?
SRP.A: The Diagnosis Confirmed stage is positioned {below} the Initial Consultation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Recommended?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Recommended is {1893}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Consultation?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Consultation is {4738}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Completed?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Completed is {1235}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {4738}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Completed, with a value of {1235}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing?
SC.A: Decreased by {1353} Patients from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 4061? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1337? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1337 and 3129? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {2874}, the {Treatment Recommended} stage has {1893}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {1440}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnosis Confirmed} to {Treatment Recommended} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended, or from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnosis Confirmed} to stage {Treatment Recommended} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Consultation} and {Diagnostic Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Initiated} and {Treatment Completed} stages.
